https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Ij7ILsQ47dHzueM1RohKR8gQTP.jpg A middle-aged man takes a high school girl to a motel room and bargains with her about the payment for sex. He argues for a discount on the grounds that she is not a virgin. At a loss, the girl agrees. Bargain
